snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s emergency executive order allows Hurricane Sandy building owners in new federal flood zones to rebuild higher without violating existing codes.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg signs emergency executive order allowing property owners with buildings damaged by Hurricane Sandy that are now in newly demarcated federal flood zones to rebuild at higher elevations without violating existing codes; Federal Emergency Management Agency has released updated flood maps that show more parts of coastal New York to be vulnerable to severe flooding.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s emergency executive order allows Hurricane Sandy building owners in new federal flood zones to rebuild higher without violating existing codes.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Issues Order Allowing Hurricane Victims to Rebuild Higher
